Package org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest

Class EntitlementsExceptionMappingHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.rest.EntitlementsExceptionMappingHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExceptionMappingHandler<EntitlementException,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException>
    public final class EntitlementsExceptionMappingHandler
extends Object
implements ExceptionMappingHandler<EntitlementException,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException>
    Default ExceptionMappingHandler for entitlements exceptions that translates errors based on the EntitlementException.getErrorCode().
    Since:
    12.0.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String DEBUG_TYPE_OVERRIDES

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      EntitlementsExceptionMappingHandler​(Map<Integer,​Integer> errorCodeMapping)
      Constructs the resource error handler with the given error code mapping and no request-type specific overrides.
      EntitlementsExceptionMappingHandler​(Map<Integer,​Integer> errorCodeMapping, Map<org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestType,​Map<Integer,​Integer>> errorCodeOverrides, Map<Integer,​Integer> errorDebugMap)
      Constructs the error resource handler with the given mapping from EntitlementException error codes to ResourceException error codes, and the given map of overrides of ResourceException error codes for particular request types.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EntitlementsExceptionMappingHandler

        @Inject
public EntitlementsExceptionMappingHandler​(@Named("EntitlementsResourceErrorMapping")
                                           Map<Integer,​Integer> errorCodeMapping,
                                           @Named("EntitlementsResourceRequestTypeErrorOverrides")
                                           Map<org.forgerock.json.resource.RequestType,​Map<Integer,​Integer>> errorCodeOverrides,
                                           @Named("EntitlementResourceErrorDebug")
                                           Map<Integer,​Integer> errorDebugMap)
        Constructs the error resource handler with the given mapping from EntitlementException error codes to ResourceException error codes, and the given map of overrides of ResourceException error codes for particular request types.
        Parameters:
        errorCodeMapping - general mapping from EntitlementException error codes to ResourceException error codes.
        errorCodeOverrides - per-request-type overrides of ResourceException error codes. The inner map keys and values are both ResourceException error codes.

      • EntitlementsExceptionMappingHandler

        public EntitlementsExceptionMappingHandler​(Map<Integer,​Integer> errorCodeMapping)
        Constructs the resource error handler with the given error code mapping and no request-type specific overrides.
        Parameters:
        errorCodeMapping - the mapping from EntitlementException error codes to ResourceException error codes.

    • Method Detail

      • handleError

        public org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException handleError​(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                                                 org.forgerock.json.resource.Request request,
                                                                 EntitlementException error)
        Constructs an appropriate ResourceException for the given request and entitlements exception. If no specific mapping is present for the error code in the exception, then an internal server error is reported.
        Specified by:
        handleError in interface ExceptionMappingHandler<EntitlementException,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException>
        Parameters:
        context - the server context from which the language header can be read.
        request - the request that failed with an error.
        error - the error that occurred.
        Returns:
        an appropriate resource error.

      • handleError

        public org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException handleError​(org.forgerock.services.context.Context context,
                                                                 String msg,
                                                                 org.forgerock.json.resource.Request request,
                                                                 EntitlementException error)
        Constructs an appropriate ResourceException for the given request and entitlements exception. If no specific mapping is present for the error code in the exception, then an internal server error is reported. Will also write a debug entry - defaulting at the ERROR level. This level can be changed by mapping the appropriate resource error to the desired debug level.
        Specified by:
        handleError in interface ExceptionMappingHandler<EntitlementException,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException>
        Parameters:
        context - the server context from which the language header can be read.
        msg - the debug message to write.
        request - the request that failed with an error.
        error - the error that occurred.
        Returns:
        an appropriate resource error.

      • handleError

        public org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException handleError​(String msg,
                                                                 org.forgerock.json.resource.Request request,
                                                                 EntitlementException error)
        Constructs an appropriate ResourceException for the given request and entitlements exception. If no specific mapping is present for the error code in the exception, then an internal server error is reported. Will also write a debug entry - defaulting at the ERROR level. This level can be changed by mapping the appropriate resource error to the desired debug level.
        Specified by:
        handleError in interface ExceptionMappingHandler<EntitlementException,​org.forgerock.json.resource.ResourceException>
        Parameters:
        request - the request that failed with an error.
        error - the error that occurred.

        Returns:
